text: Duiyu tamen suo wangyan de, ni [mu sheng] dang rennai. Ni dang zai ri chu qian [chen li] he riluo qian [bu li] zanmei songyang ni de zhu, dang zai yejian de yibufen shijian [hun li he xiao li] he baizhou zhi duan [shang li] zansong ta [zhu], yibian ni [wei an la jiang ci ni de baochou er] xinxi.
